```{r}
#| results: asis
#| layout-ncol: 3

library(tidyverse)
library(htmltools)

tribble(
  ~title, ~href,
  "Какой падеж?",          "declension.html",
  "Какая конструкция?",    "government.html",
  "Какой график?",         "plots.html",
  "Какое слово?",          "wrod_in_order.html",
  "...",                   "government.html",
  "...",                   "government.html"
) ->
  df

walk2(df$title, df$href, function(title, href){
  h3(title) |> 
    a(href = href) |> 
    div(class = "col") |>
    print()
})

```
